title: r/Prorevenge His Life Was Cursed After He Desecrated An Ancient Burial Ground!
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP is a student studying archaeology down in Australia. She's tasked with performing a dig at an ancient burial site, and she gets two absolute doofuses as her dig partners. On the very first night of the dig, her two partners spend hours digging where they're not supposed to dig and then make a joke out of everything. Well, this must have gotten them cursed, because pretty soon their lives were completely ruined!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
